fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every other role has its entire rules text twice. (Each of its abilities, attributes, etc. are doubled.)
- Players can use any number of different abilities each night, even if the rules or their roles say they can't.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Double another player each day. Starting the next night, their role's rules text will be doubled (again).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Octuple a player, and have your doubling have a significant impact on the game.
